TEXT.English: This unit has defeated the most enemy units.
TEXT.French: This unit has defeated the most enemy units.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Gegner besiegt.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha ucciso il maggior numero di nemici.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has defeated the most enemy units.

TEXT.English: This unit has fought the most battles.
TEXT.French: This unit has fought the most battles.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Kämpfe bestritten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha combattuto il maggior numero di battaglie.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has fought the most battles.

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden angerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most damage (attacking).
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most damage (attacking).
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden angerichtet (offensiv).
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno (in attacco).
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most damage (attacking).

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most damage (defending).
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most damage (defending).
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden angerichtet (defensiv).
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno (in difesa).
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most damage (defending).

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most collateral damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most collateral damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Kollateralschaden angerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno collaterale.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most collateral damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most air strike damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most air strike damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch Luftbombardierungen angerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno aereo.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most air strike damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden erlitten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most damage (attacking).
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most damage (attacking).
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden erlitten (offensiv).
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno (in attacco).
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most damage (attacking).

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most damage (defending).
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most damage (defending).
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden erlitten (defensiv).
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno (in difesa).
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most damage (defending).

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most collateral damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most collateral damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Kollateralschaden erlitten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno collaterale.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most collateral damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most air strike damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most air strike damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch Luftbombardierungen erlitten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno aereo.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most air strike damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most flanking damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most flanking damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch Flankenangriffe erlitten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno ai fianchi.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most flanking damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has suffered the most damage by other means.
TEXT.French: This unit has suffered the most damage by other means.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch andere Effekte erlitten.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha subito la maggior quantità di danno in altri modi.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has suffered the most damage by other means.

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most flanking damage.
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most flanking damage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch Flankenangriffe angerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno ai fianchi.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most flanking damage.

TEXT.English: This unit has inflicted the most damage by other means.
TEXT.French: This unit has inflicted the most damage by other means.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Schaden durch andere Effekte angerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità ha inflitto la maggior quantità di danno in altri modi.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has inflicted the most damage by other means.

TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat sich am weitesten fortbewegt.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità si è mossa percorrendo la maggior distanza.

TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat die grösste Strecke zurückgelegt (Fortbewegung + Transport).
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unitè ha attraversato le maggiori distanze.

TEXT.English: This unit has moved furthest with cargo on board.
TEXT.French: This unit has moved furthest with cargo on board.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat die grösste Strecke mit Fracht an Bord zurückgelegt.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità si è mossa percorrendo la maggior distanza con carico a bordo.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has moved furthest with cargo on board.

TEXT.English: This is your most experienced unit.
TEXT.French: This is your most experienced unit.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità con più esperienza.
TEXT.Spanish: This is your most experienced unit.

TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità più vecchia.

TEXT.English: This unit survived the battle with the worst odds.
TEXT.French: This unit survived the battle with the worst odds.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat den schwersten Kampf überlebt.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità che è sopravvissuta ad un combattimento con la peggior probabilità.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit survived the battle with the worst odds.

TEXT.English: This unit is your most cautious unit - its average combat odds are highest.
TEXT.French: This unit is your most cautious unit - its average combat odds are highest.
TEXT.German: Dies ist Ihre vorsichtigste Einheit - ihre durchschnittlichen Kampfchancen sind am höchsten.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità più cauta - la sua media di probabilità di combattimento è la maggiore.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit is your most cautious unit - its average combat odds are highest.

TEXT.English: This unit is your most reckless unit - its average combat odds are lowest.
TEXT.French: This unit is your most reckless unit - its average combat odds are lowest.
TEXT.German: Dies ist Ihre wagemutigste Einheit - ihre durchschnittlichen Kampfchancen sind am tiefsten.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità più impavida - la sua media di probabilità di combattimento è la minore.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit is your most reckless unit - its average combat odds are lowest.

TEXT.English: This is your luckiest unit - its total survival odds are lowest.
TEXT.French: This is your luckiest unit - its total survival odds are lowest.
TEXT.German: Dies ist Ihre glücklichste Einheit - ihre zusammengezählten überlebenschancen sind am tiefsten.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità più fortunata - la sua probabilità totale di sopravvivenza è la minore.
TEXT.Spanish: This is your luckiest unit - its total survival odds are lowest.

TEXT.English: This unit spent the longest time fortified without interruption.
TEXT.French: This unit spent the longest time fortified without interruption.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit war am länsten ohne Unterbruch verschanzt.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità che è rimasta fortificata più a lungo senza interruzioni.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit spent the longest time fortified without interruption.

TEXT.English: This unit spent the most time fortified.
TEXT.French: This unit spent the most time fortified.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit war insgesamt am länsten verschanzt.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità che è rimasta fortificata più a lungo complessivamente.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit spent the most time fortified.

TEXT.English: This unit spent the most time in enemy territory.
TEXT.French: This unit spent the most time in enemy territory.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit war insgesamt am länsten in feindlichem Gebiet.
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la tua unità che ha trascorso più tempo in territorio nemico.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit spent the most time in enemy territory.

TEXT.English: This unit has cast the most spells.
TEXT.French: This unit has cast the most spells.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Zauber gewirkt.
TEXT.Italian: This unit has cast the most spells.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has cast the most spells.

TEXT.English: This unit has survived the most enemy spells and summoned units.
TEXT.French: This unit has survived the most enemy spells and summoned units.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Kämpfe gegen beschworene Einheiten und Zauber rüberlebt.
TEXT.Italian: This unit has survived the most enemy spells and summoned units.
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has survived the most enemy spells and summoned units.

TEXT.English: This unit has killed the most enemy heroes
TEXT.French: This unit has killed the most enemy heroes
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit hat am meisten Helden besiegt.
TEXT.Italian: This unit has killed the most enemy heroes
TEXT.Spanish: This unit has killed the most enemy heroes

TEXT.Italian: ucciso l'unità nemica %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) (Forza rimasta: %s3/%s4) - Probabilità di combattimento: %s5
TEXT.Spanish: acabado con [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) (Fuerza nueva: %s3/%s4) - Probabilidades del combate: %s5

TEXT.English: Killed by a %s1 %s2 (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5
TEXT.French: éliminé par [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) (Nouveau puissance: %s3/%s4) - Probabilité de conflit: %s5
TEXT.German: Einheit wurde von %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) vernichtet (verbleibende Kampfstärke: %s3/%s4) - Kampfchancen: %s5
TEXT.Italian: ucciso dall'unità nemica %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) (Forza rimasta: %s3/%s4) - Probabilità di combattimento: %s5
TEXT.Spanish: acabado por [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] %s2_EnUName (%s1_owner_adjective) (Fuerza nueva: %s3/%s4) - Probabilidades del combate: %s5

TEXT.English: Withdrew from combat with %s1 %s2 (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5
TEXT.French: Withdrew from combat with %s1 %s2 (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5
TEXT.German: Einheit hat sich vom Kampf mit %s2 (%s1) zurückgezogen (verbleibende Kampfstärke: %s3/%s4) - Kampfchancen: %s5
TEXT.Italian: Ritirato dal combattimento con %s1 %s2 (Forza rimasta: %s3/%s4) - Probabilità di comnattimento: %s5
TEXT.Spanish: Withdrew from combat with %s1 %s2 (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5

TEXT.English: %s1 %s2 withdrew from combat (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5
TEXT.French: %s1 %s2 withdrew from combat (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5
TEXT.German: %s2 (%s1) hat sich vom Kampf mit Ihrer Einheit zurückgezogen (verbleibende Kampfstärke: %s3/%s4) - Kampfchancen: %s5
TEXT.Italian: %s1 %s2 ritirato dal combattimento (Forza rimasta: %s3/%s4) - Probabilità di comnattimento: %s5
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 %s2 withdrew from combat (Remaining Strength: %s3/%s4) - Combat Odds: %s5

TEXT.German: Hier klicken, um die Statistiken dieser Einheit zu öffnen

TEXT.English: Close the screen and select this unit
TEXT.French: Close the screen and select this unit
TEXT.German: Hier klicken, um die Statistiken zu schliessen und die Einheit zu zentrieren
TEXT.Italian: Chiudi la schermata e seleziona l'unità
TEXT.Spanish: Close the screen and select this unit
